languages.text: {n}Джай уворачивается от буйного чудища и с мольбой обращается к вам:{/n} "{name}, шерин, свет очей моих, выручи по-братски! То есть по-дружески... да как тебе угодно, в общем, должна буду, потом раскидаемся обязательно, ты меня знаешь! Я в таких вопросах вилять жопой не стану, сполна отплачу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай уворачивается от буйного чудища и с мольбой обращается к вам:{/n} "{name}, шерин, свет очей моих, выручи по-братски! То есть по-дружески... да как тебе угодно, в общем, должна буду, потом раскидаемся обязательно, ты меня знаешь! Я в таких вопросах вилять жопой не стану, сполна отплачу!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"
languages.original_text: {n}Джай уворачивается от буйного чудища и с мольбой обращается к вам:{/n} "{name}, шерин, свет очей моих, выручи по-братски! То есть по-дружески... да как тебе угодно, в общем, должна буду, потом раскидаемся обязательно, ты меня знаешь! Я в таких вопросах вилять жопой не стану, сполна отплачу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, the light of my eyes, help me out like a brother would! Or a friend, whatever! I will owe you one, and I always pay my debts, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one and will pay you back in full!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, the light of my eyes, help me out like a brother would! Or a friend, whatever! I will owe you one, and I always pay my debts, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one and will pay you back in full!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I will owe you one and I always pay my debts, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one and will pay you back in full!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I will owe you one and I always pay my debts, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one and will pay you back in full!"

I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは暴れる獣をかわし、懇願するようにあなたに話しかける。{/n}「{name}様、シャリーン、あたしの光。この落ちこぼれを助けてちょうだい！仲間でしょ！ううん、友としてでいいわ！借りは必ず返す！あたしは逃げたりはしない、知ってるでしょう？必ず約束は果たすから！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは暴れる獣をかわし、懇願するようにあなたに話しかける。{/n}「{name}様、シャリーン、あたしの光。この落ちこぼれを助けてちょうだい！仲間でしょ！ううん、友としてでいいわ！借りは必ず返す！あたしは逃げたりはしない、知ってるでしょう？必ず約束は果たすから！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊躲开了巨人的动作，恳求着你。{/n}“{name}，亲爱的，我眼中的明光，帮帮我这个可怜虫吧，好吗？或者……把我当成你的朋友也行！我欠你个人情，我肯定会还的，你最清楚了！我从来不会欠别人的人情不还，我一定会全部还清的！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊躲开了巨人的动作，恳求着你。{/n}“{name}，亲爱的，我眼中的明光，把我当成你的姐妹，帮帮我吧！或者把我当成你的朋友也行！我欠你个人情，我肯定会还的，你最清楚了！我从来不会欠别人的人情不还，我一定会全额还清的！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae esquiva a la bestia desbocada y se te suplica:{/n} «¡{name}, shereen, luz de mis ojos, ayude a un soldado, por favor! O a una amiga, ¡lo que sea! Le deberé una y yo siempre pago mis deudas, ¡lo sabe! Nunca intento escaquearme de estos tratos. ¡Se lo compensaré como es debido!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae esquiva a la bestia desbocada y se te suplica:{/n} «¡{name}, shereen, luz de mis ojos, ayúdeme como lo haría un{mf||a} herman{mf|o|a}! O un{mf||a} amig{mf|o|a}, ¡lo que sea! Le deberé una y yo siempre pago mis deudas, ¡lo sabe! Nunca intento escaquearme de estos tratos. ¡Se lo compensaré como es debido!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae weicht dem wütenden Monstrum aus und fleht dich an:{/n} "{name}, Shereen, Licht meiner Augen, helft einer Soldatin, ja? Oder einer Freundin ... was auch immer! Dann bin ich Euch schuldig, und ich begleiche meine Schulden, das wisst Ihr! Ich winde mich nie aus einem solchen Handel, ich begleiche die Schuld vollständig!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae weicht dem wütenden Monstrum aus und fleht dich an:{/n} "{name}, Shereen, Licht meiner Augen, helft mir bitte, wie ein Bruder es tun würde! Oder ein Freund, egal! Ich bin Euch dann was schuldig, und ich begleiche meine Schulden immer, das wisst Ihr! Ich winde mich nie aus einem solchen Handel, ich begleiche die Schuld vollständig!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae esquive la bête et vous supplie :{/n} « {name}, shereen, lumière de mes yeux, aidez-moi comme le ferait {mf|un frère|une sœur} ! Ou {mf|un ami|une amie}, qu'importe ! Je vous en devrais une, et je règle toujours mes dettes, vous le savez ! Je suis pas du genre à me défiler, et je vous rembourserai avec les intérêts, je vous le jure ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae esquive la bête et vous supplie :{/n} « {name}, shereen, lumière de mes yeux, aidez-moi comme le ferait {mf|un frère|une sœur} ! Ou {mf|un ami|une amie}, qu'importe ! Je vous en devrais une, et je règle toujours mes dettes, vous le savez ! Je respecte toujours ce genre de marché, et je vous rembourserai avec les intérêts, je vous le jure ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, saldırıya geçen yaratıktan kaçınarak seninle rica edercesine konuşuyor.{/n} "{name}, şirinim, gözümün bebeği... Yoldaşına, arkadaşına... Aman, neyse... Yardım edersin, değil mi? Sana iyilik borcum olur, ben borçlarımın altında kalmam. Sen de biliyorsun! Böyle anlaşmalarda asla yan çizmem, borcumu kuruşu kuruşuna öderim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae dodges the rampaging beast and addresses you pleadingly:{/n} "{name}, shereen, light of my eyes, help a grunt out, will you? Or friend... whatever! I'll owe you one, and I always square up, you know it! I never weasel out of deals like this one, I'll pay you back in full!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae, saldırıya geçen yaratıktan kaçınarak seninle rica edercesine konuşuyor.{/n} "{name}, şirinim, gözümün bebeği... Yoldaşına yardım edersin, değil mi? Ya da arkadaşın... Aman, neyse! Sana iyilik borcum olur ve ben borçlarımın altında kalmam. Sen de biliyorsun! Böyle anlaşmalarda asla yan çizmem, sana borcumu tamamen öderim!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
